tool_description: Calculates distance between two points specified as longitude and latitude coordinates. Returns distances in miles, kilometers, and nautical miles.
name: Distances
title: Distances

api_list.name: calculate distance
api_list.description: Enter GPS coordinates of two points, and get the distance between them in Kms, miles, and nautic miles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://distances1.p.rapidapi.com/distance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distances1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://distances1.p.rapidapi.com/distance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distances1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
